mapper.select: SELECT A.iorder, A.rdt, B.nm, B.uid , A.spent_point, A.payment_way, A.order_status , A.result_price, C.idetail, E.nm AS detailNm, (count(E.nm) - 1) AS cnt FROM t_order A INNER JOIN t_user B ON A.iuser = B.iuser INNER JOIN t_order_product C ON A.iorder = C.iorder INNER JOIN t_product_detail D ON C.idetail = D.idetail INNER JOIN t_product_master E ON E.iproduct = D.iproduct GROUP BY B.iuser
